item.title: Open Letter to IG Michael Horowitz and SSA Jason LeBeau on Transparency and Communication in McDonald’s Case
item.description: Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2024-07-18_1659_0800_email-to-michael-horowitz-and-jason-lebeau_Redacted.pdf From: Vincent B. Le Corre Subject: Legal Pathways Needed for Direct Communication Date sent: July 18, 2024, 16:59 +0800 (China Standard Time) To: Michael E. Horowitz (Inspector General DOJ), Jason LeBeau (Senior Special Agent, DOJ OIG) Cc: Chuck Grassley (U.S. Senator), Elizabeth Johnson (Chief of Staff of Senator Romney), Jennifer Heins Davis (Chief of Staff of Senator Grassley), Christopher A. Wray (FBI Director), Tristan Leavitt (President of Empower Oversight), Jason Foster (Founder & Chair of Empower Oversight), Mike Zummer (Empower Oversight), Adam Rogalski (Legal Attaché/State Department), Gurbir Grewal (Director of the Division of Enforcement of the SEC), Mahonri Manjarrez (FBI language specialist), Vincent B.
